items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Messages are delivered in the correct order
Users can see when the other party is typing
dependencies: WebSocket or similar real-time communication service
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one or group video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from a chat window
Video and audio quality remain stable with minimal lag
Participants can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video
Call ends gracefully when a participant leaves
non_functional: Support for at least 10 concurrent participants in a group call
Adaptive bitrate streaming for varying network conditions

notes: Exact user authentication, contact management, and UI design details are not specified and will need clarification.
